author: Pamela Muse
text:
What does it cost for your staff to take payments at the counter. Not processing fees but more the cost of staff time. If anyone has done studies and/or methods of payments and their costs would be ver helpful. 
Thank you,
Pam Muse
Alliance for Innovation
Western Regional Director
888-468-6450
pmuse@transformgov.org
title: Staff costs for processing payments
